sections.title: FRUIT STAND THEME
sections.content: This Shopify theme, intended for use by an online fruit market, showcases the best of modern CRO and Shopify development principles.

sections.title: COMPARE PRODUCTS
sections.content: This product comparison feature allows visitors to better determine which fruit they want to buy, based on factors such as price, rating, and dietary information.

sections.title: COLLECTION FILTERS
sections.content: This theme's collection pages include sleek design and modern filtering functionality, including a custom-built sliding price select feature.

sections.title: FREE SHIPPING PROGRESS BAR
sections.content: This feature provides users with a visual indicator of their progress towards free shipping, enhancing the shopping experience and boosting conversion.

sections.title: ITALIAN BAKERY SHOPIFY THEME
sections.content: This Shopify 2.0 theme—created for a medium-sized Italian bakery—was built with a focus on performance, CRO, and user experience. It lead to a 115% growth in year-over-year online revenue.

sections.title: PRODUCT CATEGORIZATION AND NAVIGATION
sections.content: Navigation and product categorization was completely overhauled, guided by user behavior analytics and best practices, to create a more intuitive shopping experience.

sections.title: THIRD-PARTY APP INTEGRATION
sections.content: A third party app related to in-store pickup and local delivery time management was integrated into the theme, following styles to make it look and function like the rest of the site.
